titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization for the Upper Delaware Citizens Advisory Council for an additional ten years.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-697.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Favorable Executive Comment Received From Interior.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-452.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 868.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 1/28/1988--Introduced. Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to extend the authorization of the Upper Delaware Citizens Advisory Council for an additional ten years.
